version_description:
NEW!
Purchasing the Coin Doubler now rewards a 2048 coin bonus!

All players that already own the Coin Doubler get awarded their 2048 coins on re-launch of the game

What else is new?
• Enhanced PAC-MEN and TRAP power-ups
• Ensure sc

• 4 new power ups: RADAR, CHERRIES, SONAR, ELECTRIC
• New theme: Classic 80's
• Everyplay integration: you can now record and and share your gameplay! (*latest devices only)
• Improvements for iOS 9 support
• Additional performance improvement

• New theme: Crossy Road
• New theme: The Grid
• New exclusive BEAM power-up
• iCloud support
• New ways to decrease your power-up upgrade times
• Additional performance improvements and bug fixes

• New theme: Crossy Road
• New theme: The Grid
• New exclusive BEAM power-up
• iCloud support
• New ways to decrease your power-up upgrade times
• Additional performance improvements and bug fixes

NEW THEMES! Play PAC-MAN 256 like a Champion, with Robotz, and in the Office.

- Added PAC-MAN Championship Edition theme
- Added Robotz theme
- Added Office theme
- Themes can now be purchased with Coins
- See and beat your friends (and

NEW THEMES
• PAC-MANIA
• Go-Karts
• Garden

IMPROVEMENTS
• Themes can now be shuffled!
• New in-game friend score leaderboards!
• Game Center Achievements

MAJOR UPDATE, PLEASE READ CAREFULLY!

• No More Credits: You now play with your power-ups enabled all of the time! Continue by using coins or by watching ads.
• Power-ups now unlock over time instead of eating certain amounts of PAC-DOTs!
• Up
